column.name: param_type
column.text: 参数类型: 100=登陆用户的租户ID 104=登陆用户的主组织ID 105=登陆用户的用户ID 102=登陆用户的主岗位ID 150=登陆用户的单元ID ; 200=静态值

statements.statement:
select * from sys_cache_url_param where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and ( cache_id = %${key}% or param_name like '%${key}%' or param_value like '%${key}%' or param_code like '%${key}%' or param_type = '%${key}%' or remark like '%${key}%' ) </#if>
<#if query.ids??> and id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.cacheId??> and cache_id = ${query.cacheId} </#if>
<#if query.paramName??> and param_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.paramName)}' </#if>
<#if query.paramValue??> and param_value = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.paramValue)}' </#if>
<#if query.paramCode??> and param_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.paramCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.paramType??> and param_type = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.paramType)}' </#if>
<#if query.sn??> and sn = ${query.sn} </#if>
<#if query.remark??> and remark = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.remark)}' </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if> </#if>
